item.title: What we know about US-Ukraine minerals deal
item.description: A Ukrainian official says Kyiv has agreed to the terms of a deal which would give the US access to mineral deposits.

item.title: Chile power cut: 'We were trapped like sardines in the dark'
item.description: Millions of people in Chile had their routines disrupted by an almost nationwide power cut.

item.title: UK suspension of aid is 'punitive', Rwanda says
item.description: The UK says it is halting aid to Rwanda as a result of its support for the M23, a notorious rebel group.

item.title: Romanian far-right candidate for presidency taken for questioning
item.description: Prosecutors are investigating alleged campaign fraud, after Georgescu came from nowhere to win the first round.

item.title: Ukraine PM says minerals deal agreed with US
item.description: Denis Shmyhal said the Ukrainian government would not sign a deal without security guarantees.
